Package com.giift.sdk.ui.fragment

This package contains a list of fragments that shall be reused extensively in different versions of full form apps

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AboutUsFragment.arguments  
    AboutUsFragment.Callback  
    BrandIndexFragment.Callback
    Callback interface to be implemented by parent activities, which want to be notified about a program being selected by the user
    CardDetailFragment.Callback
    Interface that should be implemented by activity who wants to be informed of user interactions and trigger new activity or else
    CardEditFragment.Callback  
    CartFragment.Callback
    Interface to be implemented by the parent activity in order to be informed of Order creation from the current Cart.
    ConversionListFragment.Callback
    Callback that should be implemented by the parent activity to be informed when a user selected a conversion.
    CouponListFragment.Callback
    Interface to be implemented by parent activity in order to be informed of a coupon being selected
    DatePickerFragment.ExpiryListener
    Interface to be implemented by the target Activity if it wants to be informed of the result.
    IDeportedActivityResultHandler  
    IFragmentListener  
    IMapFragment.MapFragmentListener
    Callback to be implemented by parent class, to be informed that a specific location was selected.
    MyProfileFragment.Callback  
    OrderFragment.Listener  
    OrderListFragment.Callback
    Interface that should be implemented by the parent activity to be informed of a user selecting a specific element.
    PaymentFactory.Listener  
    PaymentProviderListFragment.Listener  
    PortfolioFragment.Callback
    Callback to be implemented by the parent activity to be informed of actions requested by the user.
    PortfolioFragment.CallbackSearchView
    Callback to be implemented by the parent activity when SearchView is expanded/collapsed user.
    PortfolioFragment.SwipeCallback  
    ProductFragment.Callback
    Callback to set Action Bar title*
    ProductListFragment.Callback
    Interface to be implemented by the parent activity to be informed, when a user selects a product
    ProgramDetailFragment.Callback
    Interface to be implemented by parent activity to be informed about any change.
    SellForCashFragment.Callback  
    SocialLinkFragment.Callback  
    TransactionsFragment.Listener  
    WfFragment.Listener
    Interface to be handled by parent activities about the necessity to open a url.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AboutProgramFragment
    Fragment displaying the "about us" content of a program.
    AboutUsFragment
    Fragment displaying the "About Us" of the App Title : R.array.about_us_titles SubTitle : Pass String array as argument (arguments.putStringArray(AboutUsFragment.KEY_SUB_TITLES, subTitles))
    AndroidPay  
    BarcodeFragment
    Fragment displaying the barcode of a card and its number.
    BrandIndexFragment
    Fragment displaying the list of active programs.
    BuyableWFFragment
    A simple Fragment subclass.
    CardDetailFragment
    Fragment displaying the details of a card and allowing the user to update it.
    CardEditFragment
    Fragment to update card details.
    CartFragment
    Fragment that displays the current Cart and its CartItems, it allows transforming the Cart into an Order.
    ChangePasswordFragment
    A simple Fragment subclass.
    ConversionListFragment
    Fragment displaying the list of conversions related to a specific dmo.
    CouponFragment
    Fragment used to display details about a coupon.
    CouponListFragment
    Fragment displaying a list of coupons.
    DatePickerFragment
    Fragment to display the DatePicker Dialog.
    DatePickerPreference
    Dialog which allows picking a date.
    FriendDetailsFragment  
    IMapFragment
    Abstract class which handles the loading of a list of locations.
    LocationFragment
    Fragment with a static map at the top and a scrollable list of locations below.
    MapFragment
    Fragment which is displaying on an interactive google maps the list of locations of a retailer.
    MyProfileFragment
    Fragment to display the Users Profile

    Updates server user updates profile by calling User.UpdateAsync(Context, Bundle)
    NewsListFragment
    Fragment displaying a list of news attached to a specific dmo.
    OrderFragment
    Fragment that displays the summary of an Order.
    OrderItemFragment
    A simple Fragment subclass.
    OrderListFragment
    Fragment displaying a list of Orders.
    PaymentFactory  
    PaymentProviderListFragment
    A simple Fragment subclass.
    PayOnDeliveryFragment
    A simple Fragment subclass.
    PortfolioFragment
    Fragment displaying the portfolio of a specific user.
    ProductFragment
    Fragment displaying the details of a product.
    ProductListFragment
    Fragment displaying a list of products linked to a dmo.
    ProgramDetailFragment
    Fragment displaying the details of a program/dmo.
    SellForCashFragment
    A simple Fragment subclass.
    SocialLinkFragment
    A simple Fragment subclass.
    StripePaymentFragment
    A simple Fragment subclass.
    SuccessFragment
    A simple Fragment subclass.
    TransactionsFragment
    Fragment displaying the list of transactions associated to a card.
    UseCardFragment
    Fragment displaying a small text encouraging the user to use his card.
    WebMapFragment  
    WebPaymentFragment
    A simple Fragment subclass.
    WfFragment  

Package com.giift.sdk.ui.fragment Description

This package contains a list of fragments that shall be reused extensively in different versions of full form apps
